mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.zixunshi_name as zixunshiName ,a.zixunshi_phone as zixunshiPhone ,a.zixunshi_id_number as zixunshiIdNumber ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.zixunshi_email as zixunshiEmail ,a.zixunshi_photo as zixunshiPhoto ,a.zixunshi_congye as zixunshiCongye ,a.zixunshi_shanchang as zixunshiShanchang ,a.zixunshi_content as zixunshiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM zixunshi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.zixunshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiName},'%')
and a.zixunshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiPhone},'%')
and a.zixunshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.zixunshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiEmail},'%')
and a.zixunshi_congye like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiCongye},'%')
and a.zixunshi_shanchang like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiShanchang},'%')
and a.zixunshi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.zixunshiContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
